\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage{pgf,tikz,pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.15}
\usepackage{mathrsfs}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\definecolor{qqttcc}{rgb}{0,0.2,0.8}
\definecolor{rvwvcq}{rgb}{0.08235294117647059,0.396078431372549,0.7529411764705882}
\definecolor{wrwrwr}{rgb}{0.3803921568627451,0.3803921568627451,0.3803921568627451}
\definecolor{ffffff}{rgb}{1,1,1}
\begin{tikzpicture}[line cap=round,line join=round,>=triangle 45,x=1cm,y=1cm]
\begin{axis}[
x=1cm,y=1cm,
axis lines=middle,
xmin=-8.208792346227185,
xmax=12.951731737936896,
ymin=-4.355072773127875,
ymax=7.695433474802001,
xtick={-8,-7,...,12},
ytick={-4,-3,...,7},]
\clip(-8.208792346227185,-4.355072773127875) rectangle (12.951731737936896,7.695433474802001);
\fill[line width=0.4pt,color=wrwrwr] (-1.8,5.2) -- (-7.88,-2.76) -- (9.247684430417705,-2.616384419171926) -- (12.751136252406509,5.368960724640424) -- cycle;
\fill[line width=0.4pt,fill=black,fill opacity=0.1] (1.8305064554046568,0.04087186855458833) -- (1.909247398423517,-0.034026888492832676) -- (1.7764361469865055,-0.10661189323901409) -- (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673) -- cycle;
\fill[line width=0.4pt,fill=black,fill opacity=0.1] (1.7442489134529913,0.10505455356272099) -- (1.6502885645860832,0.18991064224785767) -- (1.6066287837718352,0.05960839690358129) -- (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673) -- cycle;
\fill[line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq,fill=rvwvcq,fill opacity=0.1] (4.347554332141375,1.4055960463353554) -- (4.1924261259396145,1.33033289302936) -- (4.19712668141884,1.1837259044623352) -- (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867) -- cycle;
\draw [line width=0.8pt,color=wrwrwr] (-1.8,5.2)-- (-7.88,-2.76);
\draw [line width=0.8pt,color=wrwrwr] (-7.88,-2.76)-- (9.247684430417705,-2.616384419171926);
\draw [line width=0.8pt] (9.247684430417705,-2.616384419171926)-- (12.751136252406509,5.368960724640424);
\draw [->,line width=0.8pt] (-0.48,2.1) -- (4.367784716065373,6.827338937966816);
\draw [->,line width=0.8pt] (-0.48,2.1) -- (5.947688614639597,3.0646730742571426);
\draw [->,line width=0.8pt] (-0.48,2.1) -- (2.9126100726417468,-1.217698019246686);
\draw [line width=1.6pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.3677847160653736,6.827338937966817)-- (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867);
\draw [line width=0.8pt] (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867)-- (2.662275190863293,2.5715953821453135);
\draw [line width=0.8pt] (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867)-- (0.9154627506364279,0.7353503925919933);
\draw [line width=1.6pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867)-- (1.6933509428388436,-0.02536128933015943);
\draw [line width=1.6pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.3677847160653736,6.827338937966817)-- (1.6933509428388436,-0.02536128933015943);
\draw (4.350116103724744,1.4709416500446078) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{Y}$};
\draw (2.082917094707164,-0.6725919584811171) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathbf{1}$};
\draw [->,line width=0.4pt] (-0.4776182726057983,2.0976708634093115) -- (2.663760056587606,2.570435940725546);
\draw (0.9974096903896561,3.477069258023812) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\beta}_2 X$};
\draw (1.4920712923571282,5.345790865456495) node[anchor=north west] {$Y$};
\draw (5.916544509955072,3.1198136566028576) node[anchor=north west] {$X$};
\draw (-0.2804661146929799,1.5671258504271723) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\beta}_1 \mathbf{1}$};
\draw [->,line width=0.4pt] (-0.47761827260579814,2.0976708634093115) -- (0.916750389412439,0.735545796742318);
\draw [->,line width=0.4pt] (0.9167503894124391,0.7355457967423181) -- (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159686);
\draw (0.6813758891326601,0.6190244466561786) node[anchor=north west] {$\bar{y}\mathbf{1}$};
\draw (4.556225104544525,5.51067806611232) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\varepsilon}$};
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.8305064554046568,0.04087186855458833)-- (1.909247398423517,-0.034026888492832676);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.909247398423517,-0.034026888492832676)-- (1.7764361469865055,-0.10661189323901409);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.7764361469865055,-0.10661189323901409)-- (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673)-- (1.8305064554046568,0.04087186855458833);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.7442489134529913,0.10505455356272099)-- (1.6502885645860832,0.18991064224785767);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.6502885645860832,0.18991064224785767)-- (1.6066287837718352,0.05960839690358129);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.6066287837718352,0.05960839690358129)-- (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673);
\draw [line width=0.4pt] (1.6933509428388434,-0.025361289330159673)-- (1.7442489134529913,0.10505455356272099);
\draw (-5.446931735242132,-1.2084753606125482) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathcal{M}(X)$};
\draw [->,line width=0.8pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt] (-0.48,2.1) -- (4.346996506873607,1.2560988745734867);
\draw [line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.347554332141375,1.4055960463353554)-- (4.1924261259396145,1.33033289302936);
\draw [line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.1924261259396145,1.33033289302936)-- (4.19712668141884,1.1837259044623352);
\draw [line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.19712668141884,1.1837259044623352)-- (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867);
\draw [line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq] (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867)-- (4.347554332141375,1.4055960463353554);
\draw [color=qqttcc](2.014214094433904,4.246542861084328) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathbf{\left\lVert Y - \bar{y}\mathbf{1}\right \rVert}$};
\draw [color=qqttcc](3.0172778984235,0.7701710472573515) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathbf{\left\lVert \hat{Y} - \bar{y}\mathbf{1}\right \rVert}$};
\draw [color=qqttcc](3.6768267010467963,3.9579902599366346) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathbf{\left\lVert \hat{\varepsilon}\right\rVert = \left\lVert Y - \hat{Y} \right \rVert}$};
\draw [shift={(1.8301237174229517,0.1320492815942189)},line width=1.2pt,color=rvwvcq]  plot[domain=-0.9456097374421821:2.195982916147611,variable=\t]({1*0.08355229559094564*cos(\t r)+0*0.08355229559094564*sin(\t r)},{0*0.08355229559094564*cos(\t r)+1*0.08355229559094564*sin(\t r)});
\draw [color=qqttcc](2.014214094433904,0.8526146475852641) node[anchor=north west] {$\theta$};
\begin{scriptsize}
\draw [color=ffffff] (-1.8,5.2) circle (0.5pt);
\draw[color=ffffff] (-1.695747920322136,5.380142365593125) node {$A$};
\draw [fill=ffffff] (-0.48,2.1) circle (0.5pt);
\draw[color=ffffff] (-0.3766503150755439,2.2885073532964064) node {$E$};
\draw [fill=ffffff] (4.346996506873608,1.2560988745734867) circle (0.5pt);
\draw[color=ffffff] (4.734852905255001,1.4365901499079774) node {\hat{Y}};
\draw [fill=ffffff] (2.662275190863293,2.5715953821453135) circle (0.5pt);
\draw[color=ffffff] (2.7699470974397644,2.755687755154577) node {$a$};
\end{scriptsize}
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
